message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY. 

The paper deals with natural language processing and semantic matching, which are core topics in the field of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of word-vector averaging and natural language entailment data suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The task of matching a proposition against a corpus also involves information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the user study on disaster recovery suggests a potential application in cybersecurity (cs.CY).
